review time so I think this game was
played incredibly well and I think
everyone's line of plays and their
reactions were pretty much on key it
seemed very much like whenever someone
would pull ahead the rest the table
would stop him and then the game would
reset basically until someone else
pulled ahead again I think by the end of
it so many people had so few cards in
their hands that no matter who resolved
the decree of pain that person was most
likely winning speaking of the decree of
pain I thought it was pretty genius that
Matt used the swords to plowshares on
his own creature I never would have
thought of that and it really shows how
well he knows the deck in and out since
if the worm call had died with The
Anointed procession and taissa he would
have gotten a bunch more tokens which in
turn would have given Trevor more draw
towels continuing his tradition of
building sweet and interesting decks and
I love the idea of an enchantress base
Urich deck doubling the battlefield
trigger of a lot of constellation spells
is fantastic true to form though he did
have some interesting cards like that
Meletus astronomer who I'm not really
too sure what was going on with it but I
think he was running it in conjunction
with auras to manipulate the top deck
and basically get some card draw from it
it's a shame that ryan wasn't able to
connect a few times with in fact because
i think things would have added up very
quickly and people would have been a lot
more afraid of a Patra as it stood
though it seemed like once he started
getting more of a bored state after the
board wipe basically he would lose it
immediately with the Banshee killing all
of the snakes it meant they could never
really effectively attack beyond using
her Patra and the Banshee and I feel
like it cut off a lot of his potential
for being aggressive
last but not least Trevor's vial Smasher
and eek reduc continues to prove why
it's probably my favorite deck that he's
ever built
it's resilient its adaptable and it's a
lot of fun and it's very untraditional
typically we see blue when it comes to
spell slinging so the fact that Trevor
is forcing himself not to run the most
powerful and predominant spell singing
